channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Lenovo Notebook BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Lenovo Notebook BIOS

item.title: CVE-2017-3754|2024-08-05T14:39:40.296Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- lenovo%20notebook%20bios
item.description: Some Lenovo brand notebook systems do not have write protections properly configured in the system BIOS. This could enable an attacker with physical or administrative access to a system to be able to flash the BIOS with an arbitrary image and potentially run malicious BIOS code.
